message.content:
1. The postoperative hospital stay in LP had a mean of 3.14 days.
2. The minimum postoperative hospital stay in LP was 2 days.
3. The maximum postoperative hospital stay in LP was 7 days.
4. The postoperative hospital stay in the open group had a mean of 8.29 days.
5. The minimum postoperative hospital stay in the open group was 7 days.
6. The maximum postoperative hospital stay in the open group was 11 days.
7. The postoperative hospital stay in LP was significantly less than the open group.

messages.content:
Statement: The postoperative hospital stay in LP was mean 3.14 Days (2-7 days) significantly less than the open group mean of 8.29 days (7-11 days).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
